word:
I do not depend upon myself. I must hang my helpless soul upon Jesus Christ. I feel my weakness. I know that in and of myself I can do nothing, but through Christ strengthening me I can do all things. Oh, how my soul longs for God!--Ms 63, 1893, pp. 3, 4. (Diary, Jan. 1893.) 

Released January 7, 1960.
